Description: Student cannot recall a sequence of 4 steps even after prompted at least three times
Student can recall a sequence of 4 steps with 1 or no prompts
Student can recall at least 2 sections of the warm up from class to class
Student can recall entire warm up sequence, moving in time with the teacher, and can repeat diagonal steps after one prompt from the teacher
Student can recall entire warm up sequence without teacher guidance, at least four diagonal steps, and at least 16 counts of choreography without teacher prompts
Student can recall entire warm up, at least eight diagonal steps, all of choreography and name at least 6 muscles without teacher prompts
Student can memorize a new sequence of choreography given in one class and do all of the above
